website_summaries.verdict: Good quality for the price on a small toaster that has features of more expensive models.
pros: Nice quality construction on this model
Has 7 options for shades of toast
Includes a defrost and bagel button
Works as well, if not better than more expensive models
Crumb tray is easy to slide out and clean
cons: The surface of this toaster does heat up when you are using it

customer_reviews.title: Good temp control
customer_reviews.text: First thing I did was try the toaster at it's highest setting and the lowest. At the highest it the bread got nice and a dark brown and did not burn. The lowest, slightly crispy and slightly brown. And as expected the middle setting was a nice middle of the two. Weird thing is their is no brand name on the box and a sticker bar code that says made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Alex R

customer_reviews.title: Yet another bad toaster
customer_reviews.text: They display a chart showing how the toast will look for the corresponding numbers on the toaster dial. I tried all the numbers near my choice and all I ever got was bread toasted on one side and un-toasted on the other side. Maybe I got a lemon but I doubt it. This seems to be par for the course for most toaster manufacturers.
customer_reviews.author: OhioClint

customer_reviews.title: What I expected
customer_reviews.text: Only had the toaster for a couple of days and used it the first time this morning. Toasted the heels of bread just right, no burns on the edges and nicely brown. It could have been a bit longer as the heels were a fairly tight fit, but I think it will do the job for us in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Lichty

customer_reviews.title: Nice toaster for the price
customer_reviews.text: The color is a little more persimmon than red but we are still happy with the cute toaster that works well!
customer_reviews.author: RuthChar49

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Toast Evenly
customer_reviews.text: The toaster looks good, has many good features, and thought paying a bit more for this toaster that it would toast great. However, some of the heating elements on the toaster I received don't light up, and some heat up more than others resulting an uneven toasting. The toaster is adequate but was expecting better.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Eisen

customer_reviews.title: Mine is definitely not 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Thought this going to be a great toaster..best reviews of any..bagels come out overdone on one side and it's hard to switch from toast to bagel..not easy at all to read the settings..I returned it ):
customer_reviews.author: jesse adams

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this toaster to replace our new Oster 'toaster oven' which took 7-minutes to toast a piece of bread. Great decision as this little toaster has been wonderful to use - simple, quick and toasts up the perfect bread, English Muffins and bagels.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: This little red toaster
customer_reviews.text: I had given this toaster a terrible review, I gave the little red toaster more time and I'm happy with it now, my son liked it so I continued to try it and sure enough it turned out OK so I put the Cuisinart that I ordered later in the closet to save for a raining day. I feel so bad that I wrote a bad review.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: not Deep enough to toast a whole standard piece of bread. Hard to see numbers to regulate amount of toast. Generally a C rating
customer_reviews.author: carol brooks

customer_reviews.title: Highly rated toaster
customer_reviews.text: Much more uniform toasting action than our old toasters. Temperature control knob settings could be marked more clearly.
customer_reviews.author: Pete
